settings.title: SHARE YOUR CALECIM® JOURNEY
settings.text: We are so proud of what our products can do and we’re excited to see how they work for you. All we ask is that you share your hair growth journey with CALECIM®, and as a reward you can receive 30% off your next full-size product as a thank you.

settings.title: Before and After pictures - before using our product for the first time, start by taking a ‘before’ picture of the area of concern, this could be your hair line or at the crown of your head against a plain backdrop. It could even be the amount of hair that you shed after a hair wash. After 6 weeks usage, take another picture at the exact angle. You can find guidelines on how to take clear before-after pictures here.
Video with your CALECIM® review - take a short video testimonial with the CALECIM®️ Advanced Hair System product clearly in view.
WHAT DO I NEED TO DO?
settings.text:
After 6 weeks of applying the Advanced Hair System, share with us your journey by using the form provided below. 

These are the 2 ways you can tell your story:
